Who I Am

Self-learning software developer with an extensive sales and audio-technical background. Currently interning for Yeti-CGI, designing ambient multi-user web experiences using CasualOS (Yeti's full-stack software).

I'm looking to secure a position within a stable and profitable organization where I can be a member of a team, and utilize my experience to the fullest. My fealty for technology, and customer satisfaction, is my leading edge to engineering refined solutions for todays problems.

Preformatted

i = 0;
									
									while (!deck.isInOrder()) {
									    print 'Iteration ' + i;
									    deck.shuffle();
									    i++;
									}
									
									print 'It took ' + i + ' iterations to sort the deck.';
